section.p: Medications administered in response to the emergency--usually by the EMS crew.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11465 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.72"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10445)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10448)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 negative action values If a substance is recorded as not given, it shall be recorded with a negationInd =True, and with a MedicationNotAdministeredReasonObservation (2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.105)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10447)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.01 Null Flavor for pertinent negative cases = NA

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10450), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:10449)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.04
See appendix for mapping NEMSIS values to FDA values and for postcoordination of device information.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10446)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, EMedications.06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, dose in doseQuantity.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:7517)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, EMedications.06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, dose in doseQuantity.

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] approachSiteCode (CONF:11630), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.109 DYNAMIC (CONF:11629)
Two NEMSIS route (eMedications.04) values imply sites in addition to routes: "nasotracheal tube" and "tracheostomy"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10451)
This observation is required if negationInd = True.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10458)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:10460)/@code="RSON" Reason (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10459)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Not Administered Reason Observation (CONF:10461)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:10452)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct such that it (CONF:10465)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial such that it (CONF:10466)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11620), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10467)
NEMSIS Trace: eMedications.03 Note: all of RxNorm is valid in this field, but NEMSIS provides a selected list at https://nemsis.org/technical-resources/version-3/version-3-resources/.
For blood products, the following SNOMED CT codes may be used: 116762002 Administration of blood product 116795008 Transfusion of cryoprecipitate 116861002 Transfusion of fresh frozen plasma 116865006 Administration of albumin 180208003 Intravenous blood transfusion of platelets 33389009 Transfusion of whole blood 71493000 Transfusion of packed red blood cells

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10453)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Response Observation (CONF:10468)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Complication Observation (CONF:10472)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10455)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Prior Administration Observation (CONF:10477)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:10456)
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:10481)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10484)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.09
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10482), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.46 DYNAMIC (CONF:10483)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.10

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10457)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act such that it (CONF:10485)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:10486)/@code="INFRM" (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10487)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAuthorizationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.47 DYNAMIC (CONF:10488)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.11 - Medication Authorization channel

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:11074)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" (CONF:11182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:11075)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:11183)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice such that it (CONF:11076)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11184), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EMSMedicationAdministrationDevice 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.108 DYNAMIC (CONF:11381)
For NEMSIS route codes that imply devices (eHistory.15 and eMedications.04)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10445)
contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10448)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 negative action values If a substance is recorded as not given, it shall be recorded with a negationInd =True, and with a MedicationNotAdministeredReasonObservation (2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.105)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10447)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.01 Null Flavor for pertinent negative cases = NA

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10450), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:10449)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.04
See appendix for mapping NEMSIS values to FDA values and for postcoordination of device information.

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] approachSiteCode (CONF:11630), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.109 DYNAMIC (CONF:11629)
Two NEMSIS route (eMedications.04) values imply sites in addition to routes: "nasotracheal tube" and "tracheostomy"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10446)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, EMedications.06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, dose in doseQuantity.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:7517)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, EMedications.06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, dose in doseQuantity.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10451)
This observation is required if negationInd = True.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10458)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:10460)/@code="RSON" Reason (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10459)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Not Administered Reason Observation (CONF:10461)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:10452)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct such that it (CONF:10465)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial such that it (CONF:10466)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11620), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10467)
NEMSIS Trace: eMedications.03 Note: all of RxNorm is valid in this field, but NEMSIS provides a selected list at https://nemsis.org/technical-resources/version-3/version-3-resources/.
For blood products, the following SNOMED CT codes may be used: 116762002 Administration of blood product 116795008 Transfusion of cryoprecipitate 116861002 Transfusion of fresh frozen plasma 116865006 Administration of albumin 180208003 Intravenous blood transfusion of platelets 33389009 Transfusion of whole blood 71493000 Transfusion of packed red blood cells

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10453)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Response Observation (CONF:10468)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Complication Observation (CONF:10472)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10455)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Prior Administration Observation (CONF:10477)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:10456)
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:10481)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10484)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.09
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10482), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.46 DYNAMIC (CONF:10483)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.10

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:10457)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act such that it (CONF:10485)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:10486)/@code="INFRM" (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10487)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAuthorizationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.47 DYNAMIC (CONF:10488)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.11 - Medication Authorization channel

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:11074)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" (CONF:11182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:11075)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:11183)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice such that it (CONF:11076)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11184), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EMSMedicationAdministrationDevice 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.108 DYNAMIC (CONF:11381)
For NEMSIS route codes that imply devices (eHistory.15 and eMedications.04)

body.codeblock: <substanceAdministration classCode="SBADM" moodCode="RQO"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.72" extension="2022-01-01"/> <consumable> <manufacturedProduct/> </consumable> <entryRelationship typeCode="XCRPT"> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.106" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="67540-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Response to medication NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="XCRPT"> <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.108" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="67539-7" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Medication administered prior to this unit's EMS care NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </substanceAdministration>
